product_name: Kiehl's Since 1851Powerful-Strength Dark Circle Reducing Vitamin C Eye Serum
summary: SummaryHighlightsVeganSustainable PackagingGive BackThe Powerful-Strength Dark Circle Reducing Vitamin C Eye Serum is a dark circle eye cream by Kiehl's Since 1851 formulated with vitamin C that helps visibly reduce blue and brown dark circles.
details: DetailsBenefitsClinically-demonstrated* to help decrease the appearance of dark circles, puffiness, lines, and crow's feetVisibly reduces both blue and brown dark circlesInstantly smooths and hydrates the under-eye area to refresh the appearance of tired-looking, strained eyesLightweight, layerable formula gently warms upon application to help optimize absorptionDermatologist-and-ophthalmologist-tested for safetySuitable for contact lens users*Clinical grading of the full panel tested in an 8-week studyKey IngredientsPure Vitamin C: a highly efficacious antioxidant known for its ability to improve the appearance of skin aging; known to help boost radiance, improve texture, and visibly reduce the appearance of lines, wrinkles, and other signs of agingFragmented Hyaluronic Acid: acts like a sponge and draws moisture into skin's surface layers and expands as it absorbs; known to help smooth and plump and is commonly used in skincare products intended to visibly reduce facial lines and refine textureTri-Peptide Complex: gradually helps counteract the visible effects of dark circles and puffinessItem 2556331How To UseAfter cleansing, dispense onto fingertip and apply to clean skinGently pat and smooth under the eye area along the sub-orbital boneUse every morning and eveningKeep out of eyesIf contact occurs, rinse thoroughly with waterIngredientsPropylene Glycol, Dimethicone, Glycerin, Ascorbic Acid, Dimethicone Crosspolymer, Cetyl PEG/PPG-10/1 Dimethicone, Cyclohexasiloxane, Aqua/Water, Hydroxyethylpiperazine Ethane Sulfonic Acid,Lauroyl Lysine, Aluminum Starch Octenylsuccinate, Polysilicone-11, CI 77891/Titanium Dioxide, Adenosine, Hydrolyzed Hyaluronic Acid, Steareth-20, Chlorhexidine Digluconate, N-Hydroxysuccinimide, Sodium Citrate, Potassium Sorbate, Palmitoyl Tripeptide-1, Chrysin, Pentaerythrityl Tetra-di-t-Butyl Hydroxyhydro-cinnamate, Palmitoyl Tetrapeptide-7, Citric Acid, Biotin.Shipping & Coupon RestrictionsThis brand is excluded from most Ulta Beauty coupons.See brand eligibility details
how_to_use: After cleansing, dispense onto fingertip and apply to clean skinGently pat and smooth under the eye area along the sub-orbital boneUse every morning and eveningKeep out of eyesIf contact occurs, rinse thoroughly with water

reviews.headline: Absolutely Loved it
reviews.comments: My budget for an eye cream was half what I paid, but this eye serum is so worth it.

reviews.headline: It's just ok
reviews.comments: I bought this because the store didn't have the  color correcting eye serum I wanted so I took a chance.  It just ok - doesn't seem to color correct as well as other brand I started using.  It's moisturizing, but not as much as I thought it would be. it's ok, but I'll go back to Sunday Riley's color corrector eye serum.

reviews.headline: Burned my skin off
reviews.comments: Purchased this to reduce dark circles and it did the total opposite after the first use.  Skin was became very irritated and burned my skin off making it hard to even close my eyes.  Skin irritated for 8 days and the only reason it started to heal was due to my esthetician.  She provided me with treatment to help reduce the pain that I was in.  Thank God I didn't have to go yo the doctor.

reviews.headline: I would buy this product again and again.
reviews.comments: I am so happy to see Kiehl's line being carried in my local Ulta!  I love all their products.

reviews.headline: Best ever
reviews.comments: I've tried lots of eye creams but this beats them all for my mature undereyes. I have repurchased 3 times now and will continue

reviews.headline: This is awesome
reviews.comments: This is awesome for mature under eyes, i use it everyday. I have had no issues at all, will repurchase.

reviews.headline: It works well for me!
reviews.comments:
I have fair skin with light freckles. I'm in my late 40s with a natural face (no fillers or injections, etc), and my eyes are dark and puffy underneath. 
I started using this product last year and have definitely noticed a huge difference. My undereyes appear smoother and more even toned with the rest of my face. I still use foundation and a light concealer to balance everything out. I paused using this product for a few months and immediately noticed the difference of with vs without. I've noticed no drying, only moisturizing effects and it works well as a first or second layer with my other face products.

reviews.headline: No difference
reviews.comments: I have been using this product for at least 6  months and I have not noticed any difference for the dark circles under my eyes.

reviews.headline: Yes i would I love it
reviews.comments: All the products I bought I love all of them üíì and I would be some more thank you ultaü§ç

reviews.headline: I do not recommend
reviews.comments:
I went to use the item for the first time and it came out a brown color!
Not comfortable putting it any where near my eyes.

reviews.headline: Never again!
reviews.comments: Bought this product 3 days ago, and use it that day. But after 3 days got a fluffy under  eyes  as well as roughness in the edge of my eyes. I was worried to continue. I was so disappointed for this brand. Expensive but has bad effect

reviews.headline: Horrible Reaction
reviews.comments: I have been a loyal kiehls customer for years and ive never had a reaction like this one. After one use i had a huge mark on the outer corner of one eye, my eyes were red, puffy, and itchy.

reviews.headline: Disappointed a 100 years im super sad
reviews.comments: Ive been using this eye fineline serum now 3 months no difference. But the feel of it is soft not fragrance waste of my hard earn money im disappointed i had good things about the product.

reviews.headline: Not too sure of this product
reviews.comments: I am disappointed that this product is yellow. According to the website, it should be white. I realize vitamin C can turn yellow when exposed to air but the very first pump came out yellow. Leading me to believe it could be out of date. I hope it works!

reviews.headline: Did  nothing for my dark circles
reviews.comments: I was excited to use product mainly from all the positive reviews. I used per instructions, and after using for 2 months honestly can't tell a difference.

reviews.headline: Gave me a stye
reviews.comments: My eye is swollen under the eye area. I think the serum was too heavy and may have entered last night and caused an infection. I had to return it. I am afraid to put even makeup on now!

reviews.headline: Reaction
reviews.comments: I have used this product for a year and loved it. I purchased a  second bottle and had a terrible reaction. Itchy and dry skin. I had to return the unused portion. I purchased a different eye cream.

reviews.headline: I don't know
reviews.comments: I'm not sure I'll be able to contusion using it, it's stinging. And I don't consider myself sensitive. Not a nice way to fall asleep

reviews.headline: Not clean, overpriced Mica sparkles Ôøº
reviews.comments: Tripeptide is only the best in this product, so you better off purchasing any other tripeptide cream because this one contains mica sparkles (which is hidden in description Ôøº) mica is terrible for your skin specially under eye, it has aluminum in it to  not clean product ÔøºÔøº!

reviews.headline: Would not buy again
reviews.comments: This product didn't it work. Actually made my under eye worse.

faceoff_positive.comments: The best way to know how it works is to teste it first. I had a sample that I'm using and it feels great on my eyes. I'm not sure if is helping with the black circles though. It would be great to have more samples of other products that I'm interested in trying before buying,but Kiehls no longer give them as they used to do it before.üòíNot good.
faceoff_positive.headline: Good moisturizer eye cream!

faceoff_negative.comments: Been using this product for 2 months. Really wish I would have read the reviews instead of wasting my money. Not only has this product NOT worked but it has dried out the skin under my eyes so much that what once were wrinkles now feel like dried out scabs. Read that again. I'm serious. I've never had dry skin - it has always been very balanced and normal. I don't know what to do about my eyes now. The skin is so sensitive I can no longer use make up wipes as they sting. Everything stings because the skin there is so dry. For such an expensive product you would think the least it could do is NOT worsen the problem! So disappointed and sad.
faceoff_negative.headline: This product didn't help but worsened the problem
